item.description:
As part of the New Haven International Festival of Arts and Ideas, the East Coast premier of The Movie Music of Spike Lee and Terence Blanchard ? FREE!

Spike Lee introduces and hosts an evening of the musical scores to his film, as orchestrated and performed by leading jazz composer Terence Blanchard. Join fellow young New Haven residents for a picnic and concert on the Green. Bring a picnic dinner and enjoy an evening of good company and great music with the Office of International Students and Scholars at Yale. The performance itself begins at 8 p.m.

This will be the first collaboration between the NHC and the OISS--but not the last. Keep an eye out for upcoming combined events!

Contact: Dana 315-396-3669
item.name: Sat. 6/9 - Picnic on the Green with Spike Lee and the International Center
